Question.txt: You can help me sort out these cogs I need help with. Or feel free to look around.
Question.reply: I might just have a look around.

Conversation.Response: Might as well. This is off to the wreckers.

Game.wingame: Oh thank you, thank you. Things are looking up already! Oh no, more broken cogs!
Game.endgame: Come back again anytime! These cogs have a tendency to fall out of place!
